Title: Tackling Torchsnarl
Description:
Torchsnarl runs Warrens for Candle King. Nothing but big bully! Very, very big bully.

We show everyone. Bullies can be beaten!
PortraitGiverText: One of the Candle King's enforcers, Torchsnarl holds sway over the Warrens and takes vicious pleasure in oppressing dissent.
CompletionText: Torchsnarl is big one. Don't know why hiding behind flunkies. Still, can't miss him!
RewardText:
Sad he got away, but everyone else? See him as coward! Just as good.

I'm tall, so I use words good. He's huge! He should use words gooder! Not very smart.
